items.title: AMD Ryzen 3 3100
items.description: The AMD Ryzen 3 3100 desktop processor has essential performance for today's top PC games.

items.title: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
items.description: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X gaming desktop processors features 6 incredible cores for those who just want to game.

items.title: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
items.description: AMD Ryzen 5 7600X is a desktop gaming processor built for intense gaming action that comes with 6 CPU cores, & a base clock speed of 4.7GHz

items.title: AMD Ryzen 7 7700X
items.description: AMD Ryzen 7 7700X is a dominant gaming desktop processor that comes with 8 CPU cores, 16 threads, and a max boost clock speed of up to 5.4 ghz

items.title: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X
items.description: AMD Ryzen 9 7950X is a 16-core powerhouse processor and 32 threads that can do it all for the most demanding gamers and creators.

items.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3050
items.description: The GeForce RTX 3050 is built with graphics performance of the NVIDIA Ampere architecture. It offers dedicated 2nd gen RT Cores and 3rd gen Tensor Cores

items.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
items.description: The GeForce RTX TM 3060 Ti and RTX 3060 let you take on the latest games using the power of Ampere NVIDIA's 2nd generation RTX architecture.

items.title: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
items.description: AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT graphics card has 40 compute units, 12GB of GDDR6 memory, & a game frequency of 2424 Mhz, with powerhouse 1440p resolution gaming.

items.title: AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT
items.description: AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT graphics card has 40 compute units, 12GB of GDDR6 memory, a game frequency of 2495 Mhz, and an incredible 1440p gaming experience.

items.title: AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT
items.description: Built on the groundbreaking AMD RDNA™ 3 architecture with chiplet technology, AMD Radeon RX 7900 XT graphics deliver next-generation performance, visuals, and efficiency at 4K and beyond.

items.title: Crucial RAM 8GB DDR4 3200MHz CL22
items.description: There’s an easy cure for a slow computer: more memory. Designed to help your system run faster and smoother, Crucial Desktop Memory is one of the easiest and most affordable ways to improve your system’s performance.

items.title: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro SL 16GB (2x8GB)
items.description: High performance memory that illuminate your system with vivid, animated lighting from ten individually addressable, ultra-bright RGB LEDs per module.

items.title: T-Force Vulcan Z DDR4 32GB Kit
items.description: T-Force Vulcan Z DDR4 32GB Kit is a high-performance computer memory solution that is designed to provide blazing-fast speed and optimal multitasking capabilities.

items.title: Kingston FURY Beast 64GB (4x16GB) 3200MHz DDR4 CL16
items.description: Kingston FURY Beast DDR4 is the perfect choice for a system builder, or someone looking for an upgrade to jump start their sluggish system.

items.title: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro 64GB (4x16GB) DDR4 3200 (PC4-25600) C16
items.description: High performance DDR4 memory illuminates your system with vivid, animated lighting from ten ultra-bright, individually addressable RGB LEDs per module.

items.title: ASUS Prime B450M-A II AMD AM4
items.description: AMD AM4 Socket : Compatible to Ryzen 5000, 3rd/2nd/1st Gen AMD

items.title: MSI B450 GAMING PLUS Max
items.description: Supports 1st, 2nd and 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen/ Ryzen with Radeon Vega Graphics and 2nd Gen AMD Ryzen with Radeon graphics/ Athlon with Radeon Vega Graphics desktop processors for socket AM4.

items.title: ASUS AM4 TUF Gaming X570-Plus (Wi-Fi)
items.description: AMD AM4 socket: Ready for 2nd and 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processors to maximize connectivity and speed with up to two M.2 Drives, USB 3.2 Gen2 and AMD StoreMI.

items.title: ASUS ROG Strix B550-F Gaming
items.description: AMD AM4 Socket and PCIe 4.0: The perfect pairing for Zen 3 Ryzen 5000 & 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen.

items.title: MSI B550-A PRO ProSeries
items.description: Support for 3rd Gen AMD Ryzen processors and future AMD Ryzen processors with BIOS update.

items.title: Thermaltake Versa H21 SPCC ATX Mid Tower Computer Chassis
items.description: Designed for gamer, perforated metal mesh front and top panel to allow quick heat dissipation and rapid air intake for maximum ventilation. The heighten foot-stands at the bottom help to enhance airflow.

items.title: Thermaltake V250 Motherboard Sync ARGB ATX Mid-Tower Chassis
items.description: The V250 Tempered Glass ARGB Mid Tower Chassis is the newest member of Thermaltake V Series chassis. Its three preinstalled 120mm 5V ARGB front fans can be controlled via the motherboard synchronization software or the RGB switch on the top of the I/O port.

items.title: Corsair 4000D Airflow Tempered Glass Mid-Tower ATX PC Case - Black
items.description: Combining innovative cable management, concentrated airflow, and proven CORSAIR build quality, the 4000D is a fitting choice for an immaculate high-performance PC.

items.title: ASUS TUF Gaming GT501 ZENITSU Mid-Tower Computer Case
items.description: Mid-Tower with support for EATX Motherboards featuring a metal chassis and panels with custom TUF Gaming spatter pattern and 4mm-thick smoked, tempered-glass full view side panel.

items.title: Lian-Li O11 Dynamic EVO ATX Mid Tower Tempered Glass Computer Case
items.description: Dynamic EVO Aluminum, Steel & Tempered Glass ATX Mid Tower Computer Case.
